title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the project scope, objectives, and requirements for the SensoryCortexStimulator device.

title: Device Architecture and Design (Revised) - Review Suggestions
description: Review and provide feedback on the updated design of the SensoryCortexStimulator device architecture, including hardware and software components, communication protocols, scalability, user experience, and safety considerations. The task has been broken down into smaller, manageable sub-tasks to facilitate implementation. Detailed documentation and diagrams have been provided wherever possible. Please review the provided design documents, identify any potential issues or areas for improvement, and provide your feedback in the 'review_comments' field. Upon completion of this task, the 'rfc_state' should be updated to 'APPROVED' if all feedback has been addressed.

title: Hardware Development
description: Develop the physical hardware components of the SensoryCortexStimulator device.

title: Software Development
description: Develop the software components for controlling and interfacing with the SensoryCortexStimulator device.

title: Data Management and Storage (Revised)
description: Design and implement a robust, efficient, and secure data management and storage system for the SensoryCortexStimulator device. The system should handle real-time data from sensors, user preferences, and session logs, with a focus on ensuring scalability, reliability, and data privacy. Implement necessary compression algorithms to reduce data size and optimize storage costs.

title: Security and Privacy Considerations
description: Assess and implement security and privacy measures for the SensoryCortexStimulator device and its data.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute comprehensive testing and quality assurance processes for the SensoryCortexStimulator device.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Develop deployment strategies and DevOps processes for the SensoryCortexStimulator device.

title: Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation and user guides for the SensoryCortexStimulator device.
